alert.note: Alert for Cortland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 3:03PM EST until December 20 at 6:17AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Unadilla affecting Otsego and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Bainbridge affecting Chenango and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Tioga and Broome Counties. Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Susquehanna and Broome Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Waverly/Sayre affecting Tioga and Bradford Counties. Tioughnioga River At Cortland affecting Cortland County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tioughnioga River at Cortland. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flood stage. Flooding leads to some closures along Kellogg Road to the south of Cortland. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:31 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 5.2 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 315 AM EST.
